TableSpec.Name: Batch Constituent Phone Custom Extension
TableSpec.Description: Stores custom constituent phone batch information.
TableSpec.Author: Technical Training

HourMinuteField.Name: STARTTIME
HourMinuteField.Description: Time that the phone number becomes valid.

HourMinuteField.Name: ENDTIME
HourMinuteField.Description: Time that the phone number becomes no longer valid.

DateField.Name: STARTDATE
DateField.Description: The date the phone number becomes valid.

ForeignKeyField.Description: The country for this phone number.
ForeignKeyField.Name: COUNTRYID

MonthDayField.Description: For seasonal phone types only: DD/MM start date of when this phone should be considered.
MonthDayField.Name: SEASONALSTARTDATE

MonthDayField.Description: For seasonal phone types only: DD/MM end date of when this phone should be considered.
MonthDayField.Name: SEASONALENDDATE

EnumField.Name: BESTTIMETOCALLCODE
EnumField.Description: Custom field within USR_PHONE that extends the PHONE table.
